alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 8:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN DUVAL COUNTY THROUGH 900 PM EDT... At 827 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers over Fort Caroline, or 7 miles northeast of Arlington, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Arlington, Mayport, Craig Field, Fort Caroline, San Marco, Riverside, and Tallyrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
